title: Browser stalls on scrolling video content in my web page
body:
1) Move all js script tags in the end of body tag or use defer attribute (Where is the best place to put <script> tags in HTML markup?)

2) Concat js files to one file (Gulp minify multiple js files to one)

There are multiple resources served from same domain.

Consider combining them into as few files as possible.

12 JavaScript resources served from cdnjs.cloudflare.com.

8 JavaScript resources served from mangabozok.com.

6 JavaScript resources served from a.disquscdn.com.

Optimize the order of styles and scripts (1)

The following external CSS files were included after an external JavaScript file in the document head. To ensure CSS files are downloaded in parallel, always include external CSS before external JavaScript.

videogular.min.css

Remove unused CSS rules (6028)

Leverage browser caching (68)

This and many more: Open devtools, select "Audit" tab and click to "Run" button.
